description: There are 10 strong men ready to prove that masculinity is the true key to "The Power of Love," and here is a never-before-seen opportunity to watch the models behind the scenes of the making of this Lucas Entertainment film. Be prepared to meet Rafael Carreras, Mitchell Rock, Alex Marte, Vito Gallo, Will Helm, Tony Axel, Mathew Mason, Trenton Ducati, Jonathan Agassi, and Michael Lucas. And there is even a surprise performance by fan-favorite Rafael Carreras that cannot be missed! Watch the behind-the-scenes reel from Lucas Entertainment's "The Power of Love" now!
title: Go Behind the Scenes of 'The Power of Love'
